contents.text: Welcome to CloudBees, the world’s first end-to-end continuous software delivery system based in the South Bay.
For information about our CI/CD solutions and developer tools, please press 1.
To learn about our Jenkins-based continuous integration services, press 1.
All our representatives are currently busy. Please hold for the next available specialist.

navigationGoals: Get a quote and feature overview for the Jenkins-based CI service.
I need information on setting up Jenkins-based CI services for my personal project.
I want to integrate our microservices pipeline with Jenkins on CloudBees and understand best practices.
I need help creating my first Jenkins build job.
I'd like help configuring a Jenkins pipeline for my physics simulation code.

contents.text: To explore our cloud-native continuous delivery platform, press 2.
All our representatives are currently busy. Please hold for the next available specialist.

navigationGoals: Request pricing details and a product demo for the cloud-native continuous delivery platform.
I’d like to explore CloudBees’ cloud-native continuous delivery platform for my startup.
I’m evaluating CloudBees’ cloud-native continuous delivery platform for containerized deployments.
I need assistance deploying my application to the cloud.
I need guidance on deploying my simulation experiments using CloudBees' cloud-native delivery platform.

contents.text: For customer support, billing, and account management, please press 2.
If you need help with billing or account questions, press 1.
All our representatives are currently busy. Please hold for the next available specialist.

navigationGoals: Clarify unexpected charges on my latest invoice and update my billing information.
I need help with my subscription invoice and to check if a veteran discount can be applied.
I need to update my subscription tier and get clarity on billing overages.
I want to update my payment information on my account.
I need to update my student subscription payment method for my CloudBees account.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
All our representatives are currently busy. Please hold for the next available specialist.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a build-pipeline error and get immediate technical support.
I’m having build failures in my pipeline and need technical support to troubleshoot.
I’m facing deployment errors in my CloudBees pipeline and need assistance debugging build failures.
I'm having trouble installing your command-line tools on my computer.
My build agent is failing to compile my physics simulation code and I need troubleshooting assistance.
